overview: Briana. Audacious. Outrageous. As comfortable on a runway as a cock. Welcome to the new breed of high-fashion supermodel. Chi Chi LaRue turns his cameras on each bodacious beauty as they strut their stuff for the fashionistas, and drop their shorts for the bucks at Vivid... all in a beautiful Bel Air mansion. Stunner. What could be funner?
title: Stunner
